// Dependencies ------------------------ import {useState , useEffect} from 'react'; import { Menu } from 'antd' ; import '../../../styles/ant-picker.scss'; // Components ------------------------- import Icon from '@ant-design/icons'; import HomeSvg from './Svg/HomeSvg'; import AboutSvg from './Svg/AboutSvg'; import ClientSvg from './Svg/ClientSvg'; import '../Sass/fullProfile.scss'; import LikeButton from '../../../components/LikeButton'; // ------------------------------------- const ProfileBody = ({profile})=>{ console.log(profile); // States --------------------------------------- const [current , setCurrent] = useState('Acceuil'); const [checkbox,setCheck] = useState(false); // Icons ----------------------------------------- const HomeIcon = props => ; const AboutIcon = props => ; const ClientsIcon = props => ; // Handlers ------------------------------------- const handleLike = ()=>{ setCheck(!checkbox); } const handleClick = e =>{ setCurrent(e.key); } return(

{profile.companyname}

{profile.nom} {profile.prenom} | {profile.title}

{profile.stars.length} J'aime
} > Acceuil }> A propos }> Clients
{current === "Acceuil" &&( <>

Presentation de l'entreprise

{profile.presentation}

Horraire

  • Lundi
  • Mardi
  • Mercredi
  • 09:00-18:00
  • 09:00-18:00
  • 09:00-18:00
  • Jeudi

  • 09:00-18:00
  • 09:00-18:00
)} {current === "propos" &&( <>

Information supplementaires

  • Domaine De travail :
  • {profile.domaine.map(el =>('- '+el+ '\n'))}
  • téléphone fixe :
  • {profile.fixphone}
  • téléphone portable :
  • {profile.mobilephone}
  • Langues parlés :
  • {profile.languages.map(el =>('- '+el+ '\n'))}
  • Diplomes :
  • 0522xxxxxx
  • Siège social :
  • {profile.addresse}
)}
J'aime
Partager
) } export default ProfileBody ;
